translated: I was one who was devoted to attending,
to the Great Seer, the Happy One.🔽See the fruit of attending on
the One who is the Protector of the World, the One who is Resolute;
I attended on the Great Seer;
I do not know of (any) bad destination,
this is the fruit of attending.
there will be one called Mahānigrodha;
powerful, with dominion over the four continents.
I have done the Teacher’s work.”🔽Thus the venerable Buddha-upatthāka recited these verses.
